results.description: Michael O'Neill says Stoke's 4-2 win against Barnsley in his first game in charge was a "great start" after having little time to prepare.
results.title: Barnsley 2-4 Stoke City: Michael O'Neill makes winning start as Stoke boss

results.description: Northern Ireland boss Michael O'Neill accepts the Stoke City manager's job but will remain in his international role for any potential Euro 2020 play-off.
results.shortTitle: NI boss O'Neill appointed by Stoke City
results.title: Michael O'Neill: Stoke City appoint Northern Ireland boss as new manager

results.description: Northern Ireland manager Michael O'Neill is expected to be in charge of Stoke City for Saturday's Championship game against Barnsley.
results.shortTitle: Stoke set to appoint NI manager O'Neill
results.title: Michael O'Neill: Stoke City set to appoint Northern Ireland manager

results.description: Only an unexpected last-minute glitch will prevent Stoke City from appointing Northern Ireland boss Michael O'Neill as their new manager, says BBC Sport NI's Thomas Kane.
results.shortTitle: 'Barring last-minute glitch, O'Neill will land Stoke job'
results.title: Michael O'Neill: Stoke City set to appoint Northern Ireland boss as manager

results.description: Stoke City's caretaker manager Rory Delap says he is unaware of the club's approach to secure the services of Northern Ireland manager Michael O'Neill.
results.title: 'First I've heard of it' - Caretaker boss Delap on Stoke's O'Neill approach

results.description: Stoke City caretaker manager Rory Delap labels the club's plight at the bottom of the Championship "heartbreaking".
results.title: Stoke City: Rory Delap 'heartbroken' by plight of Championship strugglers

thumbnail.altText: Stoke City caretaker manager Rory Delap

results.description: West Bromwich Albion ease back to the top of the Championship table as they comfortably see off managerless Stoke City.
results.shortTitle: Baggies beat managerless Stoke to go top
results.title: Stoke City 0-2 West Bromwich Albion: Slaven Bilic's Baggies win to go top

results.description: Preston North End drop their formal complaint of an alleged illegal approach from Stoke City for manager Alex Neil.
results.title: Alex Neil: Preston drop complaint against Stoke after approach for manager

results.description: Reaction as West Bromwich Albion beat the Championship's bottom side Stoke City to move back to the top of the Championship.
results.shortTitle: West Brom go top of Championship after beating Stoke
results.title: Championship live: West Bromwich Albion beat managerless Stoke City

results.description: Stoke City are refused permission by Preston North End to talk to boss Alex Neil about their managerial vacancy.
results.shortTitle: Stoke refused permission to talk to Neil
results.title: Alex Neil: Stoke City refused permission by Preston North End to talk to manager

results.description: Stoke City sack manager Nathan Jones after nine months in charge with the Potters 23rd in the Championship.
results.title: Nathan Jones: Stoke City sack manager with Potters second bottom of the Championship

results.description: Gary Rowett celebrates his first game in charge of Millwall with a comfortable victory over former club Stoke.
results.shortTitle: Rowett's Millwall sink former club Stoke
results.title: Millwall 2-0 Stoke City: Gary Rowett wins first match as Lions boss against former side

results.description: Stoke City full-back Tom Edwards signs a new four-and-a-half-year deal with the Championship club.
results.shortTitle: Stoke defender Edwards signs new deal
results.title: Tom Edwards: Stoke City full-back signs new four-and-a-half-year contract

thumbnail.altText: Tom Edwards has made 45 first team appearances for Stoke, starting with his debut in the 7-2 defeat at Manchester City in October 2017

results.description: Massimo Luongo scores the only goal of the game as Sheffield Wednesday beat Stoke to go third in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Owls beat Stoke to go third in table
results.title: Sheffield Wednesday 1-0 Stoke City: Massimo Luongo scores Owls' winner

results.description: Millwall appoint former Burton Albion, Birmingham City, Derby County and Stoke City boss Gary Rowett as their new manager.
results.title: Gary Rowett: Millwall appoint former Stoke boss as new manager

altText: Gary Rowett succeeds Neil Harris, who left The Den on 3 October after departure after four years in charge

results.description: Stoke midfielder Joe Allen praises their owners for sticking with boss Nathan Jones during a poor start to the season.
results.shortTitle: 'Fair play' to owners for backing Jones
results.title: Nathan Jones: 'Fair play' to Stoke City owners for backing boss, says Joe Allen

thumbnail.altText: Saturday's victory at home to Fulham was the first time Stoke City have won back-to-back league matches in over a year, when Gary Rowett was in charge

results.description: BBC Sport takes you through five things you may have missed in the EFL, including the end of Stoke City's penalty drought.
results.title: EFL: Stoke City score a penalty at last, Brentford beat Millwall in thriller

results.description: Stoke City move off the bottom of the Championship table as they make it back-to-back victories by beating Fulham.
results.shortTitle: Stoke beat Fulham to move off bottom
results.title: Stoke City 2-0 Fulham: Tyrese Campbell scores first league goal in Potters victory

results.description: The former West Bromwich Albion and England forward, who died last year, was an inspiration to black players.
results.shortTitle: Cyrille Regis inducted into football Hall of Fame
results.title: Cyrille Regis inducted into football's Hall of Fame

results.description: Manager Nathan Jones says "a culture of blaming and not really caring" at Stoke City is now "starting to turn".
results.title: Nathan Jones: Stoke City manager says culture is 'starting to turn'
